text.title: berry spring date night glam | get ready with me
text.p: this is the look that I have been
gravitating towards for a night out date
[Music]
night I am going to be doing another
quick little tutorial today it's just a
look that I have been going back to over
and over and over again I've just been
loving the look of it first things first
is always the skin care as
usual Road glazing milk I just feel like
my makeup never ever ever comes out the
same when I'm not using this also my
skin never feels the same when I'm not
using this product
consistently this has honestly saved my
skin this winter I was just in New York
for 2 weeks and it was cold cold cold
this cream kept my skin so intact and I
swear it saved me going to be having a
little snack while I do this this is an
organe protein shake I love these
things I drank these so much when I was
pregnant because they're just yummy and
really easy and like a big hit of
protein especially on the go I'm going
to start
today with The
Hourglass tint this is the hydrating
skin tint the veil and I'm using Color 7
so I'm going to go in with with this cuz
I don't want to use a foundation since
I'm keeping the skin really really light
it's just light and hydrating it feels
really buttery on the skin which is nice
and it Blends really beautifully too I
also love warming things up on the back
of my hand and then applying it with the
brush next I'm going to go in and do a
little bit of Contour something that
I've been doing with this that's been
fun to is I've been going here like
right from my like eyelid bone out now
I'm going to use the Hour Glass
concealer in Fawn I love this concealer
I've used it many many times talked
about it many many times I think it has
beautiful coverage it's really creamy I
think it's really nice and
buildable so I'm just going back in with
the same brush there's almost like a
little bit of leftover of the skin tint
on it which helps blend everything
really really nicely and
naturally can see how everything just
kind of melts really
beautifully I'm going to go in with a
smaller brush for the under eyes and
blend out that Contour up here maybe
it's just Placebo but I swear when I put
the Contour here and pull it out it
really makes a big difference sometimes
when I feel like my concealer under my
eyes has maybe already set a little bit
or I just want to Shear it out the
slightest bit I will take a little bit
of the glazing milk like
this and it just shears it out like the
slightest bit so that I can go in and
kind of rework it the way that I want to
to and I don't feel like it messes with
the Integrity of the concealer I always
like to go in and tap things in with my
fingers after the fact I'm going to go
in now with the bronzer just using this
cream bronzer and I like just warming up
around on the cheekbones and just the
peripheral of the face a little bit I
just bring it down into the neck behind
the ears like this because what we don't
want is to be out with a pale neck and a
bronze face those who know me know I
really like to keep things simple I just
brush up my eyebrows next I'm going to
start with the blush I'm actually going
to be using a new shade that is coming
out really soon I'm really excited about
I have been loving this blush it's in
the berry family when it's Blended out
on me it gives this really beautiful
like flush of like a fuchsia kind of
color so then I'm going to go over top
with a powder blush it has like this bit
of Sheen glow to it it's really nice and
when I go in with the powder blush I
almost like swipe a little bit under my
eyes so that it like all kind of like
the flush all happens
here super nice and then I'm just going
to go a little bit of powder this is
just a translucent powder I'm going to
go under my
eyes just really lightly cuz I still
like looking glowy
but I don't like looking greasy it's
very subtle but it does make a
difference it helps lock the under eyes
in too before I get into the lips I'm
going to add some freckles which I love
and really I just go over my natural
Freckles but sometimes I I add some more
it's like a perfect time to blend them
out before they get too set I also like
to go over my natural beauty
marks with
it cuz I love my beauty marks and I like
enhancing them I'm going to do some
mascara and I'm not using a curler
because what I've been doing is just
going right here like on the edges cuz I
think it gives this little lifted look
that's really
pretty so it's really kind of like from
the center
out this is The Hourglass ambient
lighting palette usually when it comes
to powder I actually do go in with this
color right here sometimes instead of
setting powder and I put that under my
eyes because it almost has like this Hue
or glow to it that's really really nice
so I love that I'm also going to take a
little bit of highlight and just tap it
on my
nose moving on to Lips This is peptide
lip shape in
twist really love this color and this is
our lip contour for me what I love about
these is just like a contour on the rest
of your face
same concept same idea with this but
just for the mouth area making your lips
look more full I really go on the
outside and these are creamy and very
blendable just like a regular Contour
stick would be and see how it just kind
of gives me this really natural
pouty kiss of something and then what I
also do when I want more Precision is I
will go in with a lip liner and what I
did with the Contour is I went over my
lip line to give that effect of more
fullness and now I'm going right on my
lip Line This is a smudger but it also
has these sharp edges so you can use
that part to like
clean and now I'm going to take that
same blush and tap that
in just the prettiest pinky Berry
color and the last that I've been doing
with this specific look going in at the
very corner of my eye and just doing the
babiest
little flick like that like I'm not even
really bringing it in I'm just going
from my lashes and pulling it out I just
think it makes such a big difference
it's just so sexy I love a little wing
so I think we are there show you guys
the final look
so yeah this is the look that I have
been gravitating towards a lot recently
I've been doing this a lot for a night
out date night and even sometimes in the
daytime I just do a more toned down
version of this and uh call it a day I
really love it show you in the mirror
too well there you have it thank you so
much for watching this little tutorial
and I will see you next time time
